alert.note: Alert for Burke; Divide; Mountrail; Williams (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued March 11 at 5:23PM CST until March 11 at 9:00PM CST by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM CST THIS EVENING... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM CST THIS EVENING TO 10 AM CDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the Blizzard Warning, blizzard conditions. Additional snow accumulations up to two inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. For the Winter Weather Advisory, blowing snow expected. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Divide, Burke, Williams and Mountrail counties. * WHEN...For the Blizzard Warning, until 9 PM CST this evening. For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 9 PM CST this evening to 10 AM CDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle.
